title: Secretary Salazar and Assistant to the President for Energy and Climate Change Carol Browner to Hold a Briefing on 6 Month Moratorium on Exploratory Deepwater Drilling, New Safety Measures for Offshore Oil and Gas Drilling | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
May 27, 2010

 



Secretary Salazar and Assistant to the President for Energy and Climate Change Carol Browner to Hold a Briefing on 6 Month Moratorium on Exploratory Deepwater Drilling, New Safety Measures for Offshore Oil and Gas Drilling




WASHINGTON—Today at 3:00 PM EDT, Secretary of the Interior Ken Salazar and Assistant to the President for Energy and Climate Change Carol Browner will hold a briefing with reporters to discuss the 6 month moratorium on exploratory deepwater drilling and the implementation of new safety measures for offshore oil and gas drilling.
WHAT:       Briefing to discuss 6 month moratorium on deepwater drilling and new safety measures for offshore oil and gas drilling
WHEN:       Today, May 27 at 3:00 PM EDT
Dial-in:        (800) 398-9386

Call Title:  “White House Conference Call”
